SummaryEnglish: Bakugan, also known as Bakugan 3.0 or Bakugan: Revolution, is the first season of the third generation of the Bakugan franchise. This season dramatically restructures the Bakugan brand, replacing and changing significant features of the toys, products, and overall gameplay.

1.SummaryEnglish: Acompanhe as aventuras de Dan Kouzo e seus melhores amigos: as primeiras crianças da Terra a se entrosarem com as misteriosas criaturas conhecidas como Bakugan!

1.TitleEnglish: Fire In the Sky - Ready To Rampage
1.SummaryEnglish: Dan Kouzo and Dragonoid prepare for a brawl against longtime rival Nillious as the story of how Bakugan came to live on Earth is revealed. / Bakugan around the world learn to pair with kid partners, including Mia Ono and Avian Bakugan Ventri. Kaiju-sized brawls become hugely popular until a catastrophic event changes everything!

2.SummaryEnglish: Dan, Mia and Griffin investigate a new Baku-Ball arrival to Earth but must evade Chip and his patrol unit when the Bakugan rolls-out and has a difficult time “settling in”. / Dan and Drago are introduced to the world of underground brawling and are invited to join the Dragon Clan by its leader, Kage.

3.TitleEnglish: Bunch of Misfits - Brawl or Nothing
3.SummaryEnglish: A conflict develops when Dan discovers that Mia conceals her brawling identity from her parents and she learns about Dan’s visit to the Dragon Clan Mod. / On behalf of his newly formed clan of “misfits,” Dan challenges the Insect Clan to a one-shot opportunity to “brawl-in” to join the underground league.

4.TitleEnglish: Rules Are Boring -  A Handful Of Gold!
4.SummaryEnglish: The Misfit Clan looks to gain new members by brawling the Mammal Clan for local daredevil-hacker Juno and her Bakugan partner, Bruiser. / Juno and Griffin work together to unlock new Bakugan powers while Nillious gathers the other clan leaders to plot the Misfits’ demise.

5.SummaryEnglish: Murph and Lil Jasper are left alone in the Misfit Mod overnight and must fight off Kage and Nillious who are attempting to break in to steal their Gold Evolution data. / Griffin and Trox represent the Misfit Clan in a brawl against the Dino Clan. Fearing they'll let their clan down, they draw inspiration from their favourite comic hero.

6.SummaryEnglish: Dan becomes a viral joke after a corndog-themed video made without his permission leaks. Drago attempts to distract Dan from seeing the video while the others race to find a way to get it taken down. / Frustrated by their reputation and Nillious conspiring against them, the Misfit Clan looks to form an alliance with the Aquatic Clan.

7.SummaryEnglish: A young Aquatic Clan brawler and his Bakugan partner, Octogan, visit the Misfit Mod in need of an unlikely favour. / Looking for an explanation for the Bakugan rampages, the Misfits sneak into an underground facility below the biggest tech company in the world.

8.TitleEnglish: The Sound Of Pickles - Off The Radar
8.SummaryEnglish: Excited to see the outside world, the Misfits’ newest recruit, TC, visits a local park with Hammerhead and gets in trouble when he runs into Chip and his Bakugan patrol unit. / Mia and Ventri are challenged by rivals Raven and Flame to find the location of the Avian Clan Mod.

9.TitleEnglish: The Worst Idea Of All - There Is No Dr. Raptor
9.SummaryEnglish: Juno and TC hit the streets to pick a fight with several different clans in an effort to help TC improve at brawling. / After butting heads with Mia at the Misfit Mod, Griffin and Trox meet a Dino clan pair who appear to share the same interests as them.

10.SummaryEnglish: When Mia discovers that a brawler has been trolling her online, she challenges him to a brawl at the Misfit Clan Mod and gets more than she bargained for. / Dan enforces a strict training regiment on the Misfit Clan in order to win a tournament against the other clans and prove that their diversity is a point of strength.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Misfit Clan attempts to find the location of the Bakugan brawling tournament, landing TC and Hammerhead in over their hammers…I mean, heads! / At the tournament, the Misfits find themselves in an impromptu four-on-four Baku-Brawl and must fight to prove that their diversity is a strength.

12.TitleEnglish: Terrible Bitter History - We're Great With Rodents!
12.SummaryEnglish: Drago tells the tale of his history with Nillious and the war that resulted in Bakugan being transported to Earth. / After learning that Mia’s dad is examining a Vestroian weapon that fell to Earth, the Misfits attempt to covertly retrieve a powerful and potentially dangerous piece of the technology.

13.TitleEnglish: For The Fate Of The Misfit Clan - My Fingers Were Crossed!
13.SummaryEnglish: After a damaging secret is revealed, Dan and Drago challenge Kage and Nillious to brawl for the fate of the Misfit Clan! / After several Bakugan suddenly begin to rampage through the streets, our heroes must convince the other clans to join them to save the city.

14.TitleEnglish: Neutralizer Full Power! - Hello? Mr. Mask Guy...

15.TitleEnglish: Sorry Mia's Dad - Flown Off Course

16.TitleEnglish: The Best of the Best - We're All in Trouble

17.TitleEnglish: That Hit the Spot - Drink the Burn

18.TitleEnglish: Prank the Prankster - Thanks For the Support

19.TitleEnglish: Someone Stop Me! - I Can't Take It, I Can't!

20.TitleEnglish: Knocking On the Door of Your Mind - Can't Argue With That

21.TitleEnglish: The Secrets, The Lies - Sayonara, Misfit Clan

22.TitleEnglish: A New Future - I Missed Breakfast

23.TitleEnglish: His Strength Is Now Our Strength - Broke This World

24.TitleEnglish: Thunder Crunch of the Misfit Clan - Seek Shelter Immediately

25.TitleEnglish: Don't Fight For Me - Destroy It All!
